String.Creator: npopov
String.Value: The interface is used to obtain an identifier that is unique within the system, describing the object. This ID is the same for different systems. If necessary, the application classes of the entity must implement this interface. The ID obtained via this interface is used to import / export user-defined functions to preserve the integrity of the references in the Database Object tags, when transferring the functions from one system to another (since the reference through PID in this case is violated). See ICfgObjectLookupAdvisor
